generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and occupied by pedestrians and parked vehicles.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with windows, doors, and signs.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is standing next to the open rear door of a white van on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and a white car is visible on the left side.
- truck: A white truck is visible further down the road, parked on the left side.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including one near the center of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, supporting traffic lights and signs.
- wall: A wall is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: No fence is visible in the image.
